select czb_user.user_id as userId, czb_address.receiver as realName, czb_user.user_account as mobile, czb_vip_area_config.area, czb_user.create_at as createAt, DATE_ADD(max(czb_vip_recharge_records.create_at),INTERVAL 1 YEAR) as expireTime, CASE WHEN superior_user = #{userId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS promotionType, superior_user as superiorUser, user2.receiver as spreadName, user2.user_account as promotionMobile, income.total_price as petrolMoney, income.my_income as myProfit from czb_user left join czb_vip_recharge_records on czb_user.user_id = czb_vip_recharge_records.user_id left join czb_address on czb_user.user_id = czb_address.user_id left join czb_vip_area_config on czb_vip_recharge_records.vip_area_config_id = czb_vip_area_config.vip_area_config_id left join (select czb_user.user_id,czb_address.receiver,czb_user.user_account from czb_user left outer join czb_address on czb_user.user_id = czb_address.user_id) as user2 on user2.user_id = czb_user.superior_user left outer join (select czb_user.user_id, czb_petrol_sales_records.buyer_id, sum(czb_petrol_sales_records.current_price) as total_price, sum(czb_petrol_sales_records.current_price) * 0.0045 as my_income from czb_user join czb_petrol_sales_records on czb_user.user_id = czb_petrol_sales_records.buyer_id group by czb_petrol_sales_records.buyer_id) as income on czb_user.user_id = income.buyer_id WHERE czb_user.first_level_partner = #{userId} AND partner = 0
AND czb_user.user_account like concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
AND czb_user.create_at BETWEEN #{createAt} AND DATE_ADD(#{createAt},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND czb_vip_area_config.area like concat('%',#{area},'%')
AND user2.user_account like concat('%',#{promotionMobile},'%')
AND czb_user.is_vip = #{isVip}
group by userId,realName,mobile,czb_vip_area_config.area,promotionType,superiorUser,spreadName,promotionMobile,petrolMoney,myProfit order by petrolMoney desc, expireTime desc
